issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

I have two strings.xml files in which I write some literals in order to have a multilingual application. But I have a problem since yesterday which is the following: I cannot see my app 'writing' the literals in my app, some I added yesterday are not visible and the name of locales literals are shown instead. I tried to delete all files from build folder and change tiapp.xml in order to force a full rebuild but with no luck.
Two more clues:
1. I have forgotten to write in one of these files some literals and these I added last are not seen but the older ones work properly.
2. I Android all work properly.

Thanks in advance for your time.

{html}

comments.body: Closing ticket as there has been no input for the last 6 years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
